settings.heading: Privacy Policy:
settings.description:
What information we collect?

When you create an account with www.at-home.co.in, we may collect a variety of personal information including your name, mailing address, phone number and email address.We will automatically store this information for our record.

Why we collect your information?
You may be asked to provide your personal information anytime you are in contact with www.at-home.co.in. We may use the information to provide and improve our products, services, content and advertising.

How we use your information

The personal information that we collect allows us to keep you posted on our latest product, announcements and upcoming events. It also helps us to develop, deliver and improve our products, services, content and advertising.


When we disclose your information?
www.at-home.co.in does not disclose your personal information to unaffiliated third parties, or to our affiliates, who may want to offer you their own products and services unless you have requested or authorized us to do so. 

We may disclose information about you to protect you against fraud and other crimes. 

Integrity of your personal information
www.at-home.co.in makes it easy for you to keep your personal information accurate, complete, and up to date. We will retain your personal information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required.

settings.heading: Security Policy
settings.description:
What are cookies and how @home uses them?
A cookie is a small file created by website to store information on a personal computer and which it can later retrieve. 

We may use cookies for some administrative purposes, i.e. to store our customer’s preferences for certain kinds of products or to store a password so that you do not have to input it every time you visit our website. 

If you are uncomfortable with the use of cookies technology, you can change your cookies preferences so that your browser doesn’t accept cookies or accepts them only from limited sources. 

Refer the Help section of your browser on how to enable or disable cookies.

Saving items and carts for later
You can build a cart with the items you would like to purchase, and save it for later. Save as many carts as you like, and share them via email with a friend or colleague. 

You can save an item after adding it to your cart, by clicking the “Add to Cart” button. In the “Your Shopping Cart” section, simply click “Save Cart” button. 

Your Saved Cart will be sent to your mail as you needed to provide your email address. You can access the Saved Cart list via your email. 

Secure Socket Layer – Protect Online Order Information 

www.at-home.co.in uses Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) encryption on all web pages where personal information is collected. To make purchases from this service, you must use an SSL-enabled browser such as Safari, Firefox, or Internet Explorer. Doing so protects the confidentiality of your personal information while it’s transmitted over the Internet. 

“We are using TechProcess Solutions Limited Payment Gateway which is certified by “VeriSign Secured” and “Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards (PCI-DSS)” authorities. 

Links to third party sites
www.at-home.co.in  may have links to third party sites. We are not responsible for any information collected by those third parties as it is not governed by us. It is advisable for you to learn the privacy policy of those third parties. 

Changes to Security and Privacy Policy
www.at-home.co.in  from time to time may modify or change this policy at any time with or without notice. We encourage you to refer to this policy periodically for any changes made.
